name: Unlikely Culprit 2
description:
The special food celebration on Katali Island will be cancelled unless you find the missing food!

not really an rpg but it's top down.

Free world
Arrows to move
shift - run
x - interact
z - to open bag

try picking an item and giving it to an npce

Battle mode
left and right arrows to move 
x - to punch

telephones save game
good luck

System 
press the 9 key then fresh, while in front of vending machine to clear save

f4 to exit 

escape to change fullscreen

m to mute
